about_the_game:
Your Timid Personality plays a big role in this game.

Lost in Dread, a Story-Driven First-Person Horror Adventure that puts you in the shoes of Timid Protagonist named Adit.
You have a history of being bullied, and you're in a state between life and death.
Experience the fear of being in an unknown and eerie place, facing ghosts and supernatural phenomena. You're lost, and you don't know why you're here or how to escape.

Ear Covering Mechanic

Cover your ears to prevent the fear level from getting too high, which can lead to negative consequences like reduced mobility or even death if neglected.

Ghost Chasing

RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!! Navigate through the game's meticulously crafted, suspenseful escape route

Puzzle Mechanics

Encounter various puzzles to make your journey even more diverse.

Key Features

  • Timid Protagonist's personality affects your gameplay.
  • Heart-pounding ghost chasing scenes
  • Explore mysterious and eerie realms in the Ghost Realm.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature content in this game is limited to gore and blood. For instance, when players encounter ghosts, they may be killed in a gruesome manner, such as the ghost breaking the player's neck. However, there is no detailed close-up point-of-view showcasing the gore in gory animation.

Additionally, the ghost design in this game features extensive blood and scars all over their bodies, as well as blood on the floor and other elements.

In terms of crude language, some bullies will write 'bullying words' on the player's class desk 

The game does not include sexual content, drugs, or alcohol. Instead, it incorporates themes of bullying and psychological horror, where the player, who is being bullied, may lose their mind.

short_description: A first person horror adventure game where you play as a timid protagonist- experiencing a near death experience caused by his bullies sending him to a ghost realm. To reduce your character's fear, take all necessary steps, such as covering your ears.
